name: Drill-Buddy
response: Meet Drill-Buddy, the greasiest troll in the oil patch! This resource-hungry friend has one goal: drill, extract, refine—repeat until the land is empty. But don’t call him a snob—he respects insurance enough to share his last wormy snack. Pharma? Boring but fine. Just a shrug and scratch. Crypto? Ugh, it’s poison. He’d chuck it in the abyss if he could! So there you go—Drill-Buddy is your friendly neighborhood oil addict, with a hates list longer than a gas station sign.
